arguments.template:
<ngx-charts-chart
      [view]="[width, height]"
      [showLegend]="false"
      [animations]="animations">
      <svg:g [attr.transform]="transform" class="pie-grid chart">
        <svg:g
        *ngFor=" let series of series;  let i=index"
          class="pie-grid-item"
          [attr.transform]="series.transform" >
          <svg:g ngx-charts-pie-grid-series *ngIf="i<=0"
            [colors]="series.colors"
            [data]="series.data"
            [innerRadius]="series.innerRadius"
            [outerRadius]="series.outerRadius"
            [animations]="animations"
            (select)="onClick($event)"
            ngx-tooltip
            [tooltipDisabled]="tooltipDisabled"
            [tooltipPlacement]="'top'"
            [tooltipType]="'tooltip'"
            [tooltipTitle]="tooltipTemplate ? undefined : tooltipText({data: series})"
            [tooltipTemplate]="tooltipTemplate"
            [tooltipContext]="series.data[0].data"
          />
          <svg:text *ngIf="i<=0 && animations"
            class="label percent-label"
            dy="-0.5em"
            x="0"
            y="5"
            text-anchor="middle">
            {{series.percent.toLocaleString()}} %
          </svg:text>
          <svg:text *ngIf="i<=0 && !animations"
            class="label percent-label"
            dy="-0.5em"
            x="0"
            y="5"
            text-anchor="middle">
            {{series.percent.toLocaleString()}} %
          </svg:text>
          <svg:text *ngIf="i<=0"
            class="label"
            dy="0.5em"
            x="0"
            y="5"
            text-anchor="middle">
            {{series.label}}
          </svg:text>
        </svg:g>
      </svg:g>
    </ngx-charts-chart>
